name: High Tide
description:
High Tide is a one-button reflex based multiplayer game. Players must wait for the rise of the tide to draw their weapons. The first man to reach for their blade comes out on top. But be careful not to draw too soon; dishonorable actions will be punished severely.

Controls:

Space: P1 Draw

Left Click: P2 Draw

Created in 48 Hours for Global Game Jam 2017
